#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,x,temp,i,j,flag;
    int a[11];
    int small;
    int smallelement;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        small=10000;
        smallelement=1;
        for(i=0;i<10;i++)
            cin>>a[i];

        for(i=1;i<10;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]<small)
            {
                small=a[i];
                smallelement=i;
            }
        }

        if(small==0)
        {
            cout<<smallelement;
            cout<<endl;
        }
        else if(a[0]<small)
        {
            cout<<1;
            for(i=0;i<=a[0];i++)
                cout<<0;
                cout<<endl;

        }
        else
        {
            for(i=0;i<=small;i++)
            cout<<smallelement;
            cout<<endl;

        }
    }

    return 0;
}
